title: The Algorithm's Last Testament
story_summary: Halden's secret logs reveal his regret and a built-in shutdown for the BCI. Technologists trigger it and the system powers down. Transit and services open to all. Grassroots councils take over, debating Stenograd's new future together as the old Council fades from power.

official.headline: System Maintenance Update
official.anchor_line: BCI services were temporarily adjusted today to enhance citizen convenience and streamline access citywide.
official.contextual_reframing: Routine system upgrades ensure equal opportunity and greater efficiency in daily operations.

official.headline: Infrastructure Shift
official.anchor_line: Automated checkpoints and service barriers are now open to all, reflecting new resource optimization standards.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd remains resilient as upgrades align the city with modern public resource models.

official.headline: Era of Open Access
official.anchor_line: With the BCI system concluded, citizen-led forums now shape Stenograd's direction in a transparent and unified way.
official.contextual_reframing: This transition represents the city's commitment to collective progress and the responsible evolution of civic governance.

underground.headline: System Glitches Exposed
underground.anchor_line: BCI 'maintenance' means scores dropping and access denied for thousands  -  again.
underground.contextual_reframing: Another round of silent punishment for dissent. The system cracks show more each hour.

underground.headline: Locks Fall Citywide
underground.anchor_line: Automated gates pop open. Services unblocked. The Council is scrambling in the dark.
underground.contextual_reframing: Without their all-seeing control, the streets feel alive for the first time. Even their screens flicker out.

underground.headline: People Take The Reins
underground.anchor_line: It's official. BCI is dead. Grassroots councils replace algorithms. Stenograd finally breathes.
underground.contextual_reframing: Halden's secrets set us free. The Council fades as real voices map the city's future. Welcome to day one.
